property.name: reason
property.description: Additional classification specific for each error type e.g. 'noStock'.

property.name: subjectType
property.description: Type of the object related to the error e.g. 'entry'.

property.name: subject
property.description: Identifier of the related object e.g. '1'.

bean.description: POJO representation of search query pagination.

property.name: pageSize
property.description: The number of results per page. A page may have less results if there are less than a full page of results, only on the last page in the results.

property.name: currentPage
property.description: The current page number. The first page is number zero (0), the second page is number one (1), and so on.

bean.description: POJO representation of search results pagination.

property.name: totalPages
property.description: The total number of pages. This is the number of pages, each of pageSize, required to display the totalResults.

property.name: totalResults
property.description: The total number of matched results across all pages.

bean.description: POJO representing a section of the Breadcrumb.
POJO containing the result page for product or category search.
POJO containing the result page for product search.
POJO representing a spell checker suggestion.
